isis.stitle: 5 SPEED AND 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES - ASSEMBLE - SHIFTER HOUSING (FS-5306/6306)

note.para: Interlock balls, detent balls, and springs can be used interchangeably.
Lubricate yoke pads and inserts with oil before assembly. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for recommended lubes.
Lubricate yoke bar grooves with grease before assembly.
Keep yoke bars in neutral while assembling.
The shift yoke retainer holes are not tapped on new shifter housings. The bolts used are "thread forming" and can be re-used if the shifter housing is replaced.
It may be necessary to support the yoke bars in position while installing the retainers.

step1.para: Install the interlock balls, detent balls and springs in the following order ( Figure 113):

figure.caption: Figure 113. Install Interlock Balls, Detent Balls, and Springs

step2.para: Position three (3) balls in the reverse light switch bore.
Install reverse detent spring and ball.
Position two (2) balls in adjacent cross bore.
Repeat steps b and c for 1st-2nd position, 3rd-4th position, and step b for 5th-6th position.

step1.para: Position reverse yoke in the housing assembly ( Figure 114).

figure.caption: Figure 114. Position Reverse Yoke in Housing Assembly

step1.para: Install interlock pin in 1st-2nd yoke assembly ( Figure 115).

figure.caption: Figure 115. Install Interlock Pin in 1st-2nd Yoke Assembly and Position 1st-2nd Yoke

step1.para: Position 1st-2nd yoke in the housing assembly ( Figure 115).
Install interlock pin in 3rd-4th yoke assembly ( Figure 116).

figure.caption: Figure 116. Install Interlock Pin in 3rd-4th Yoke Assembly and Position 3rd-4th Yoke

step1.para: Position 3rd-4th yoke in the housing assembly ( Figure 116).
Position 5th-6th yoke in the housing assembly ( Figure 117).

figure.caption: Figure 117. Position 5th-6th Yoke in Housing Assembly

step1.para: Position retainers; front retainer in the rear set of holes ( Figure 118).

figure.caption: Figure 118. Position Retainers and Install Bolts in Middle and Rear Retainers

step1.para: Install the bolts in the middle and rear retainers ( Figure 118).Tighten to 20 to 25 ft-lbs. (27 to 34 N• m).
Carefully shift the 5th-6th yoke into 5th gear position (rearward) ( Figure 119).

figure.caption: Figure 119. Shift 5th-6th Yoke into 5th Gear Position and Install Remaining Bolts

step1.para: Install the remaining bolts ( Figure 119).Tighten to 20 to 25 ft-lbs. (27 to 34 N• m).

note.para: Make sure interlocking system is working- can't shift into 2 gears at the same time.
